alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marinette County through 315 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Marinette County. These storms were moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Crivitz, Pembine, Goodman, Wausaukee, Pound, Peshtigo, Porterfield, Niagara and Dunbar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County
